lines.text: let a , b , c and d be characters
read a , b , c and d
print max of abs ( a - c ) and abs ( b - d ) and a new line
lines.code: cout << max ( abs ( a - c ) , abs ( b - d ) ) << endl ;

lines.text: while a ! = c or b ! = d
if a is less than c , print " R " and increment a
lines.code: if ( a < c ) cout << ' R ' , a ++ ;

lines.text: if a is greater than c , print " L " and decrement a
lines.code: if ( a > c ) cout << ' L ' , a -- ;

lines.text: if b is greater than d , print " D " and decrement b
lines.code: if ( b > d ) cout << ' D ' , b -- ;

lines.text: if b is less than d , print " U " and increment b
lines.code: if ( b < d ) cout << ' U ' , b ++ ;

mod_code: char a , b , c , d , d ;
